member.name: TBREPLACEBITMAP
member.summary: Used with the TB_REPLACEBITMAP message to replace one toolbar bitmap with another.

member.name: TBREPLACEBITMAP.hInstOld
member.summary: Module instance handle to the bitmap resource being replaced. Set this member to NULL to instead use a bitmap handle.

member.name: TBREPLACEBITMAP.nIDOld
member.summary: IfhInstOld is NULL, set this member to the bitmap handle of the bitmap that is being replaced. Otherwise, set it to the resource identifier of the bitmap being replaced.

member.name: TBREPLACEBITMAP.hInstNew
member.summary: Module instance handle that contains the new bitmap resource. Set this member to NULL to instead use a bitmap handle.

member.name: TBREPLACEBITMAP.nIDNew
member.summary: IfhInstNew is NULL, set this member to the bitmap handle of the bitmap with the new button images. Otherwise, set it to the resource identifier of the bitmap with the new button images.

member.name: TBREPLACEBITMAP.nButtons
member.summary: Number of button images contained in the new bitmap. The number of new images should be the same as the number of replaced images.
